G3 Class

Extends GeometricE3
Defined in: src/davinci-eight/math/G3.ts:136
Module: EIGHT

Constructs a G3. The multivector is initialized to zero.

rotorFromDirections

(
  • b
  • a
)
G3 chainable

Defined in src/davinci-eight/math/G3.ts:946

Computes a rotor, R, from two unit vectors, where R = (1 + b * a) / sqrt(2 * (1 + b << a))

Parameters:

  • b VectorE3

    The ending unit vector

  • a VectorE3

    The starting unit vector

Returns:

G3:

this The rotor representing a rotation from a to b.
